works_3: Equipping Smelting Factories in Adra Industrial City and Sheikh Najjar

who_we_are_text: Khalil Mahmoud Al-Shaar Company began its operations in Damascus in 1983, specializing in motor maintenance and winding under the supervision of Mr. Khalil Al-Shaar. Based in Harasta at the entrance of Damascus, Mr. Al-Shaar later expanded into importing and wholesale distribution for Syria, Iraq, and neighboring countries following significant success in motor winding and generator assembly. By the grace of God, he was instrumental in training numerous skilled professionals in this field. In early 2000, he established the current company, expanding into generator assembly, import/export, and retail. Following the events in Syria, operations in Harasta ceased due to destruction, continuing from the second branch in Damascus. This branch specializes in production line maintenance, filling and weighing machinery service, manufacturing main industrial control panels, preventing maintenance spare parts import, and retailing major global industrial electricity brands and PLC programming.
specialties_1: Sales of industrial electrical components from top global brands (Siemens, Schneider, ABB, Eaton...)
specialties_2: Specialized division for the design and execution of automated control and power panels
specialties_3: A team of skilled engineers for rehabilitating and modernizing production lines, weighing and filling machines, comprehensive maintenance, and PLC program studies and construction
specialties_4: Specialized division for importing electrical and mechanical spare parts and machinery for most Italian, German, and Chinese equipment
specialties_5: A complete team of skilled technicians for cable laying and connection within buildings and factories, managed by experienced engineers using on-site studies and AutoCAD schematics

forgot_password_text: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
verify_email_text: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
